tool.name: DownloadAGOLPhotos
tool.displayname: Download Photo Data from Survey123/ AGOL FSVeg Spatial WT Form

param.name: AGOL Username
param.dialogReference:
Enter your ArcGIS Online username

The FSVeg Spatial Walk Through Form must be shared with you via ArcGIS Online / Survey123.

param.name: AGOL Password
param.dialogReference:
Enter your AGOL password.

Your password will be encrypted and may appear shorter than when entered.

param.name: Output folder location where a folder containing photos and filegeodatabase will be written
param.expression: Output folder location where a folder containing photos and filegeodatabase will be written
param.dialogReference:
Output folder location where a folder containing photos and filegeodatabase will be written.

You must provide a folder location in which you have not prerviously run this tool. Folders and file geodatabases resulting from running this tool previously will cause errors in the running of this tool.

param.name: Provide a Feature Class of your Project Boundary
param.expression: {Provide a Feature Class of your Project Boundary}
param.dialogReference:
OPTIONAL

You can provide an optional boundary which will filter results that are returned to you by using this toolbox

tool.summary:
This toolbox is designed to download photos from the Survery 123 FSVeg Spatial Walk Through form. You must have an Arcgis Online account and the Survery 123 FSVeg Spatial Walk Through form must be shared with you.

Within the FSVeg Spatial Walk Through form is a sub form called "plot_group_1" These plot groups and associated photos are returned to the end user of this toolbox. The expected output is a folder containing all of the plots photos as jpegs and a file geodatabase containing the plot_group_1 locations. You can view the photos associated with each point in ArcMap by using the HTML popup tool found on the "Tools" toolbar in ArcMap. Additionally you can see the file name of each photo associated with a plot in the field “PhotoNames” in the attribute table of output feature class.

For more information about using this tool and its expected outputs please cut and paste this address into a web browser:

https://usfs.box.com/v/AGOLFSVegWTPhotoDownload

idCitation.resTitle: Download Photo Data from Survey123/ AGOL FSVeg Spatial WT Form
